title: Uncut jade

properties.name: description
properties.value: Uncut jade is a type of semi-precious gem. It can be acquired using the Mining skill from the Shilo Village Gem Mine, mining a gem rock, while doing Museum artefact cleaning, or from panning at the digsite (If you haven't completed the digsite quest, bring a Cup of tea to bribe the Panning guide) near the River Salve. They can also be found by pickpocketing H.A.M members.

Item ID1627

Uncut jade is a type of semi-precious gem. It can be acquired using the Mining skill from the Shilo Village Gem Mine, mining a gem rock, while doing Museum artefact cleaning, or from panning at the digsite (If you haven't completed the digsite quest, bring a Cup of tea to bribe the Panning guide) near the River Salve. They can also be found by pickpocketing H.A.M members.

An uncut jade can be cut into a jade with a chisel by a player with level 13 Crafting, and grants the player 20 Crafting experience. However, there is a chance that the player will accidentally crush it to form a crushed gem, which gives only 5 Crafting experience.

A cut jade can be used in the creation of jewellery, and in addition, players can use a chisel on an already cut jade to turn it into jade bolt tips for use in creating jade bolts via the Fletching skill.

Cutting chance[edit | edit source]

The chance to successfully cut a jade is: ( level − 1 ) ∗ 145 / 98 + 101 256 {\displaystyle {\frac {({\text{level}}-1)*145/98+101}{256}}} [1]

Based on this probability formula, the price of uncut jade 154, and the price of jade 323, the minimum crafting level to break even or better when flipping jade is 16.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Jade existed in RuneScape Classic, but its only uses were in the Legends' Quest and as an item to sell to the general shops for money.

{{External|rs|rsc=Uncut Jade}} {{Infobox Item |name = Uncut jade |image = [[File:Uncut jade.png]] |release = [[27 January]] [[2003]] |update = Shilo Village Quest online |members = Yes |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = No |noteable = Yes |destroy = Drop |examine = This would be worth more cut. |value = 30 |weight = 0.003 |exchange = Yes |id = 1627 }} [[File:Uncut jade detail.png|left|130px]] '''Uncut jade''' is a type of semi-precious [[Gems|gem]]. It can be acquired using the [[Mining]] skill from the [[Shilo Village Gem Mine]], mining a [[gem rock]], while doing Museum artefact cleaning, or from panning at the [[digsite]] (If you haven't completed the digsite quest, bring a [[Cup of tea]] to bribe the [[Panning guide]]) near the [[River Salve]]. They can also be found by [[pickpocket]]ing [[Humans Against Monsters|H.A.M]] members. An uncut jade can be cut into a [[jade]] with a [[chisel]] by a player with level 13 [[Crafting]], and grants the player 20 Crafting [[experience]]. However, there is a chance that the player will accidentally crush it to form a [[crushed gem]], which gives only 5 Crafting experience. A cut jade can be used in the creation of [[jewellery]], and in addition, players can use a chisel on an already cut [[jade]] to turn it into [[jade bolt tip]]s for use in creating [[jade bolts]] via the [[Fletching]] skill. ==Cutting chance== The chance to successfully cut a jade is: \frac{(\text{level}-1)*145/98+101}{256}{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1084600993038389248|date=13 January 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/HYHsC|archivedate=14 June 2019}} {{Skilling success chart|label=Gem cutting rates |label1=Opal|low1=128|high1=250|req1=1|color1=gray|image1=Opal.png |label2=Jade|low2=100|high2=245|req2=13|color2=green|image2=Jade.png |label3=Red topaz|low3=90|high3=240|req3=16|color3=pink|image3=Red topaz.png }} Based on this probability formula, the price of uncut jade {{Coins|{{GEP|Uncut jade}}}}, and the price of jade {{Coins|{{GEP|Jade}}}}, the minimum crafting level to break even or better when flipping jade is {{GemBreakeven | uncut = {{GEP|Uncut jade}} | cut = {{GEP|Jade}} | r = 1.4795918367 | beta = 101 | gamma = 256}}. ==Products== {{Uses material list|Uncut jade}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Uncut jade}} ===Shop locations=== {{Store locations list|Uncut jade}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 24 July 2007 |update = King's Ransom |change = The item was graphically updated. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Uncut jade detail (historical).png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:Uncut jade detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Uncut jade (historical).png|center]] |[[File:Uncut jade.png|center]] |- |29 March 2004 ⁠–
